msg: Hey, call me when you're free.
I'll call you after lunch.
Call me once you reach home.
Can you call mom later?
Don’t forget to call me in the evening.
Let’s call it a day and meet tomorrow.
Bro, call me if you need help with the project.
Call me once you’re done with the class.
I'll call you when I get some time.
Ra, call me when you're near the bus stop.
Can you call your uncle and ask about the function?
Call your dad and let him know.
Don't forget to call your grandmother on her birthday.
Call home if you’re getting late.
I’ll call you and explain the recipe.
Your sister asked you to call her.
Call amma before she sleeps.
Call me to discuss the assignment.
Please call the electrician before 5 PM.
Call and confirm the meeting time.
Can you call the lab assistant and check?
Let’s call the professor after the lecture.
Don’t forget to call and register for the exam.
Call and book the library room for our group study.
I’ll call you back in 10 minutes.
Just saw your missed call, will call soon.
Call rejected due to poor signal, try again later.
He’s in a meeting, said he’ll call back.
She couldn’t call you as her phone died.
We’ll call you if anything changes.
I’ll call and check the store’s opening hours.
Make sure to call and confirm the package delivery.
Call the clinic to reschedule the appointment.
Let’s call and wish him on his promotion.
Remind me to call the mechanic tomorrow.
Call the tuition teacher and ask for the new schedule.
I'll call and order the food in 10 mins.
Call me at 6 before the match starts.
Did you call and check the bus timings?
Call your bank and ask for the statement.
Please call me before leaving college.
We need to call the customer to confirm the address.
Try to call her after 8 PM, she's usually free then.
I'll call you once I finish cooking.
Call me if the parcel arrives early.
Let me call and check if the hall is available.
Don’t call during the meeting hours.
Can you call and remind me later?
We should call them and thank for the help.
